author: bmanikm
body:
Need an option for installing daily builds using [install-powershell.sh](
https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/f3dd2f041433c274d200720219fe5a80d39aeba3/tools/install-powershell.sh). This is required for other GitHub repositories like PowerShellGet, OneGet, etc.,

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: `install-powershell.ps1` supports this, I think that should be sufficient once you have a version of PowerShell installed.

title: Support an option on install-powershell.sh for installing the daily builds of PWSH
